dcterms:creator: C. Stab
I. Gurevych
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 402 student essays annotated at the paragraph segment level. It includes a total of 1833 paragraphs annotated with three AC types: Claim, MajorClaim, and Premise, and two AR types: Support and Attack. AAE contains a large number of argumentative markers, with almost every AC beginning with one.
dcterms:title: Argument Annotated Essay (AAE)

dcterms:creator: T. Mayer
E. Cabrio
S. Villata
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 700 abstracts of Randomized Controlled Trials (RCTs) of different diseases, collected from the MEDLINE database. It includes three AC types: Claim, MajorClaim, and Evidence, and three AR types: Support, Attack, and Partial-Attack.
dcterms:title: Abstracts of Randomized Controlled Trials (AbstRCT)

dcterms:creator: V. Niculae
J. Park
C. Cardie
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 731 user comments collected from the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau (CFPB) website. It includes five AC types: Fact, Testimony, Reference, Policy, and Value, and two AR types: Reason and Evidence.
dcterms:title: Consumer Debt Collection Practices (CDCP)

dcterms:creator: R. Schaefer
R. Knaebel
M. Stede
dcterms:description: This dataset is a fine-grained version of the Argument Annotated Essay dataset, where MajorClaims and Claims are divided into more specific categories such as Fact, Value, Policy, Common Ground, Testimony, Hypothetical Instance, Statistics, Real Example, and Others.
dcterms:title: Fine-Grained Argument Annotated Essay (AAE-FG)

dcterms:creator: D. Sileo
T. Van de Cruys
C. Pradel
P. Muller
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 1.74 million pairs of adjacent sentences with 174 discourse markers, consolidating 10k pairs per discourse marker. It is used for unsupervised sentence representation learning.
dcterms:title: Discovery corpus
